content.c_venueAddress: The Arches, Villiers St, London WC2N 6NL
content.name: Bronco Billy The Musical

primaryPhoto.description:
This new wild west show BRONCO BILLY – THE MUSICAL is heading to Charing Cross Theatre.
This rollicking new musical comedy stars West End favourites Tarinn Callendar (Hamilton) as Bronco Billy, Victoria Hamilton-Barritt (Hex) as Constance and Emily Benjamin (Cabaret) as Antoinette.
So begins a wild, zany ride in this thrillingly upbeat musical about love, reinvention, family and living your dream.
It’s 1979 and life is tough for a group of romantic fast-drawing, trick-riding, disco-dancing Wild West roustabouts and their travelling show, but things take an unexpected turn…
Book your BRONCO BILLY THE MUSICAL tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
